snippet.title: Heart of Artemisa - Teaser
snippet.description:
Heart of Artemisa is a rhythm adventure game, with dungeon crawler & Roguelite elements, where the player has to defeat enemies and solve puzzles at the beat of music.
The game’s aesthetic has a retro 16-bit pixel art style and a mix of dancing and spooky music.

Players will explore a 2D top down view world with caves and dark dungeons of the deep depths of a mysterious and cursed dungeon.
Movement and combat system are based on following the rhythm of the music.
This feature won’t be strict or obligatory. Players can proceed through the game without following the beat of music, but following the beat will make their adventure easier since the attacks will cause more damage to enemies. The more hits you do at the beat, more damage.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/3200950/Heart_of_Artemisa/
